name: sporting-goods_get_all_products
description:
Get all sporting goods products, optionally filtered by sport and category.

Args:
    sport: Filter by sport (Running, Cycling, Camping, Water Sports, Team Sports, Fitness)
    category: Filter by category (Shoes, Apparel, Equipment, Accessories, etc.)
    limit: Maximum number of products to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of products with basic information

name: sporting-goods_get_product_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific product.

Args:
    product_id: The unique ID of the product (e.g., "RUN001")

Returns:
    Product details including specifications and skill level

name: sporting-goods_search_products
description:
Search sporting goods products with multiple filters.

Args:
    query: Search term to match against name, description, brand
    sport: Filter by sport (Running, Cycling, Camping, Water Sports, Team Sports, Fitness)
    brand: Filter by brand (Nike, Adidas, The North Face, etc.)
    skill_level: Filter by skill level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Pro)
    gender: Filter by gender (Men, Women, Unisex)
    min_price: Minimum price filter
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    in_stock_only: Only show products that are in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching products

name: sporting-goods_get_sports
description:
Get all available sports categories.

Returns:
    List of sports (Running, Cycling, Camping, Water Sports, Team Sports, Fitness)

name: sporting-goods_get_categories_by_sport
description:
Get all product categories for a specific sport.

Args:
    sport: The sport to get categories for

Returns:
    List of categories available for that sport

name: sporting-goods_get_brands
description:
Get all available brands.

Returns:
    List of brands

name: sporting-goods_get_gear_recommendations
description:
Get recommended gear for a specific sport and skill level.

Args:
    sport: The sport to get recommendations for
    skill_level: User's skill level (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, Pro)
    budget: Optional maximum budget for recommendations

Returns:
    Recommended products organized by category

name: sporting-goods_get_sizing_guide
description:
Get sizing guide for a sport and product category.

Args:
    sport: The sport (e.g., "Running", "Cycling")
    category: The category (e.g., "Shoes", "Apparel")

Returns:
    Size chart with measurements

name: sporting-goods_find_size
description:
Find the right size based on measurement.

Args:
    sport: The sport (e.g., "Running", "Cycling")
    category: The category (e.g., "Shoes", "Apparel")
    measurement: The measurement value (e.g., foot length in cm, chest in inches)

Returns:
    Recommended size based on the measurement

name: sporting-goods_add_to_cart
description:
Add a product to the shopping cart.

Args:
    product_id: The product ID to add
    quantity: Number of units to add (default 1)
    size: Size for apparel/shoes (e.g., "M", "10.5")

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: sporting-goods_get_cart
description:
Get the current shopping cart contents.

Returns:
    Cart items with quantities, sizes, prices, and subtotal

name: sporting-goods_clear_cart
description:
Clear all items from the shopping cart.

Returns:
    Confirmation message

name: sporting-goods_checkout
description:
Complete the purchase of items in the cart.

Creates an order and clears the cart.

Returns:
    Order confirmation with order ID and total

name: sporting-goods_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the current user's purchase history.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of orders to return (default 20)

Returns:
    List of past orders with items and totals

name: sporting-goods_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in user's profile information.

Returns:
    User profile with user_id, name, email, phone, and default_address
